TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IKeyboardInputSite

summary.span: 在容器內管理鍵盤焦點。

span.span: Manages keyboard focus within the container.

summary.span: 這個介面實作 WPF-Win32 交互操作案例中的鍵盤訊息管理。

span.span: This interface implements keyboard message management in WPF-Win32 interoperation scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容器應該提供唯一的執行個體，這個介面的每個包含的元件。A container should provide a unique instance of this interface for each of its contained components. 介面和會一起用來跨互通界限提供鍵盤動作的支援。The interface and the are used together to provide support for keyboard actions across interoperation boundaries. 站台 (實作) 代表父代的接收器 ()。A site ( implementation) represents a parent of a sink (). 接收器 () 實作大部分的鍵盤行為。The sink () implements the majority of keyboard behavior. 因為站台特定的接收傳回的屬性，每個站台也必須提供接收器，介面。Each site must also provide a sink, because the site-specific sink is returned by a property of the interface. 如需輸入特別針對實作的架構的討論[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]交互操作，請參閱[Windows Forms 和 WPF 互通性輸入架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-interoperability-input-architecture.md)。For a discussion of the input architecture specifically implemented for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] interoperation, see [Windows Forms and WPF Interoperability Input Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-interoperability-input-architecture.md). 如需詳細資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]交互操作的案例，請參閱[WPF 和 Win32 交互操作](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] interoperation scenarios, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnNoMoreTabStops(class System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest request) cil managed
Public Function OnNoMoreTabStops (request As TraversalRequest) As Boolean

param.name: request
param.span: 指定是否應將焦點設定為第一個或最後一個定位停駐點。

span.span: Specifies whether focus should be set to the first or the last tab stop.

summary.span: 由所包含的元件在到達其最後一個定位停駐點 (Tab Stop)，且沒有要定位到的其他項目時呼叫。

span.span: Called by a contained component when it has reached its last tab stop and has no further items to tab to.

returns.span: 如果這個方法傳回 ，則站台會將焦點轉移到其他元件。

span.span: If this method returns , the site has shifted focus to another component.

returns.span: 如果此方法傳回 ，則焦點將仍位於呼叫元件內。

span.span: If this method returns , focus is still within the calling component.

returns.span: 元件應「環繞」並將焦點設定至其所包含的第一個定位停駐點。

span.span: The component should "wrap around" and set focus to its first contained tab stop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件呼叫當元件嘗試要求的焦點移動，但有任何進一步的索引標籤會停止在該方向中該自己的元件。Components call when the component attempts a requested focus move but there are no further tab stops in that direction within that own component.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Sink As IKeyboardInputSink

summary.span: 取得與這個站台相關聯的鍵盤接收。

span.span: Gets the keyboard sink associated with this site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會傳回父代介面。This property does not return the parent interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Unregister() cil managed

summary.span: 從此站台移除註冊子鍵盤輸入接收。

span.span: Unregisters a child keyboard input sink from this site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會影響容器上的站台。This property does not affect the site on the container.
